title: Collar ni Kuchiduke
description:
Kuroda Miki, a college student, has been forced to wear a color (collar) in the past and began to reject dom.  

"I hate this kind of sex and dom ..." 

Yet, the unsatisfied body continued to seek greed and healed the overflowing heat with a sensual novel.  One day, Miki met Moriya, a dom, when he visited a babysitter.  He manages to finish his work, though he is confused, but by that time his body is completely estrus.  Moreover, when he happened to find the novel on his way home, Moriya noticed his humorous lower body!?

A domsub universe BL that is sweet and gentle enough to sprout in a world where there is a master-slave relationship called a proficient sensual novelist (dom) x traumatic college student (sub) [second sex].
